div.p: This project allows to open and work with maven projects in the Netbeans IDE. Mevenide currently supports NetBeans 3.6 and 4.0dev.
You can download the snapshot release of Mevenide for Netbeans 3.x.
NOTE: Development of Mevenide for NetBeans 3.6 has been stoppped and the downloaded codebase is not production ready. Further development is going on for NB 4.0.
Mevenide for the upcoming 4.0 version contains these features .

There is not any downloadable version ready. You can build it yourself according to the instructions on the wiki pages. Reasonable effort is made to have it always working with the latest development builds of Netbeans 4.0. At the time of the writing it was 20040529xxxx and later. To get the Netbeans builds, go to the download page

NOTE: The initial version will be released right at the beginning of the stabilization phase of Netbeans 4.0. Please check the wiki pages for updates or subscribe to the announce mailing list and get notified once it's released.

A separate module implementing code completion for maven pom files (project.xml), build customization files (maven.xml) and for writing plugins in jelly (plugin.jelly) is available that works both in 3.6 and the 4.0 codebase. For details see it's homepage .
